mention.text: the murder of mr. carlos pizarro leongomez
a monstrous crime that has cut short the life of a man who had shown his will for peace and his commitment to colombia
time for good sense and prudence
the government minister and the peace adviser
the text of president virgilio barco 's message on the murder mr. carlos pizarro leongomez
